name: Simon S. Woo
content: DASH LAB DASH Lab Our Research Computer Vision, Anomaly Detection, AI Security (Deepfakes), Machine Unlearning, Data Science Applications News One paper accepted at main track of AAAI 2026 (Singapore) One full paper is accepted at NeurIPS 2025 (San Diego) One APPLIED RESEARCH PAPER, two FULL PAPERS and three SHORT PAPERS are accepted at CIKM 2025 (Seoul) (BK IF=3) Three full papers are accepted at ICCV 2025 (BK IF=4) Three full papers are accepted at MM 2025 (BK IF=4) One paper is accepted at Euro S&P 2025 (Acceptance rate: 8%) Data Driven Applied Data Science & Data Engineering Satellite Systems A.I DeepFake (Video / Audio) Detection Time Series Anomaly / Outlier Detection Security & Privacy Online User Privacy/Abuse & Fake info detection Machine Learning with Security and Privacy Join Our Lab For those interested in joining our lab, please fill out the üìù Application Form üìã We highly recommend this for individuals whose research interests align with ours and who are dedicated to research.
